About Me

Hi, I'm Lucas — a multilingual professional transitioning into web development.

Currently studying at Code Institute, I'm learning to build clean, accessible websites with a focus on user experience. I enjoy solving problems, working collaboratively, and bringing ideas to life through code.

With a background in communication and service, I bring a people-first mindset to every project — and I'm excited to keep growing in the tech world.
